content:
for the record, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/74949 seems to have regressed incremental builds (instructions as well as wall time) by some extent https://perf.rust-lang.org/compare.html?start=10b3595ba6a4c658c9dea105488fc562c815e434&end=5e449b9adff463455743291b0c1f76feec092992&stat=instructions:u
I already left a comment on the pr
